chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (v : my_value) (k : nat) (t : my_term), subst v k (MyVAbs t) = MyVAbs (subst (shift 0 v) (1 + k) t)

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive my_term : Set := MyTValue : my_value -> my_term | MyTApp : my_term -> my_term -> my_term with my_value : Set := MyVVar : nat -> my_value | MyVAbs : my_term -> my_value Arguments MyVVar _%nat_scope
Notation shift := (lift 1)
lift_subst : forall (t : my_term) (k : nat) (v : my_value) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t)
subst_subst : forall (t : my_term) (k : nat) (v : my_value) (s : nat) (w : my_value), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t)
lift_subst_2 : forall (t : my_term) (k : nat) (v : my_value) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t)
Build_LiftSubst : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t)) -> LiftSubst

Record SubstSubst (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (H0 : Subst V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_SubstSubst { subst_subst : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s : nat) (w : V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t) } Arguments SubstSubst {V}%type_scope {H H0} {T}%type_scope {H1} Arguments Build_SubstSubst [V]%type_scope _ _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
pun_pun : forall (v : my_value) (w k : nat) (t : my_term), subst v (w + k) (lift w k t) = subst v k (lift w (1 + k) t)
lift_MyVAbs : forall (w k : nat) (t : my_term), lift w k (MyVAbs t) = MyVAbs (lift w (1 + k) t)
expand_subst : forall (v : my_value) (k : nat) (t : my_term), subst v k t = traverse (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k) x) 0 t

subst_lift : forall (v : my_value) (k : nat) (t : my_term), subst v k (shift k t) = t
traverse_my_term = fix traverse_my_term (f : nat -> nat -> my_value) (l : nat) (t : my_term) {struct t} : my_term := match t with | MyTValue v => MyTValue (traverse_my_value f l v) | MyTApp t1 t2 => MyTApp (traverse_my_term f l t1) (traverse_my_term f l t2) end with traverse_my_value (f : nat -> nat -> my_value) (l : nat) (v : my_value) {struct v} : my_value := match v with | MyVVar x => f l x | MyVAbs t => MyVAbs (traverse_my_term f (1 + l) t) end for traverse_my_term : (nat -> nat -> my_value) -> nat -> my_term -> my_term Arguments traverse_my_term _%function_scope _%nat_scope

subst_lift_generalized : forall (n : nat) (v : my_value) (t : my_term), subst v n (lift (S n) 0 t) = lift n 0 t
recognize_subst : TraverseFunctorial -> TraverseIdentifiesVar -> TraverseRelative -> TraverseRelative -> forall traverse_ : (nat -> nat -> my_value) -> nat -> my_term -> my_term, traverse_ = traverse -> forall (v : my_value) (k2 k1 : nat) (t : my_term), traverse_ (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k2) x) k1 t = subst (lift k1 0 v) (k1 + k2) t

Record SubstLift (T : Type) (H : Lift T) (V : Type) (H0 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_SubstLift { subst_lift : forall (v : V) (k : nat) (t : T), subst v k (shift k t) = t } Arguments SubstLift {T}%type_scope {H} {V}%type_scope {H0} Arguments Build_SubstLift [T]%type_scope _ [V]%type_scope _ _%function_scope

Subst_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Traverse V T) => {| subst := fun (v : V) (k : nat) (t : T) => traverse (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k) x) 0 t |} : forall V : Type, Var V -> Traverse V V -> forall T : Type, Traverse V T -> Subst V T Arguments Subst_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H H0} {T}%type_scope {H1}

Build_Pun2 : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat), subst (var k) k (shift (S k) t) = t) -> Pun2
LiftZero_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (H1 : TraverseVarIsIdentity) => {| lift_zero := fun (k : nat) (t : V) => eq_ind_r (fun v : V => v = t) eq_refl (traverse_var_is_identity (fun l x : nat => var (lift 0 (l + k) x)) (fun l x : nat => eq_ind_r (fun n : nat => var n = var x) eq_refl (lift_zero (l + k) x)) t 0) |} : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V), TraverseVarIsIdentity -> LiftZero Arguments LiftZero_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H H0}

```coq
Theorem my_proof : 
  forall (v : my_value) (k : nat) (t : my_term), 
  subst v k (MyVAbs t) = MyVAbs (subst (shift 0 v) (1 + k) t).
Proof.
  intros v k t.
  unfold MyVAbs.
  rewrite expand_subst.
  rewrite lift_MyVAbs.
  apply recognize_subst.
Qed.
